text: "[color=#1240AB]Honey[/color], I knew you that you’d [color=#CD0074]come back[/color]. You have to find me; just so you’ll know the truth of what happened and the things [color=#C60000]they’re hiding from you[/color]."

"Go to [color=#C60000]District 35[/color] as soon as possible before it starts again. You always be on my mind, dear [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]. 
From: [color=#CD0074]Mom[/color]."
